title: 47 — 47 "The Wait is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!"Transliteration: "Omachi Ka Ne! Aa Fukkatsu no Bagī Senchō" (Japanese:お待ちかね!ああ復活のバギー船長) Hidehiko Kadota Junki Takegami 813.5 November 8, 2000(2000-11-08)[83] —
transformers_text: 47 47 The Wait is Over The Return of Captain Buggy Transliteration O machi Ka Ne A a Fu kka tsu no Bag Sen ch Japanese Hidehiko Ka dota Junk i Take gam i 813 5 November 8 2000 2000 11 08 83 With Buggy assumed to be dead his crew fights over who will be the new captain only to be captured by a tribe of cannibals Buggy arrives in time to save them and regains his missing parts
